content.rendered:
All Alerts and Messages

  • Security Alert: Worldwide Caution
  • Message for U.S. Citizens
  • Ghana – Level 2: Exercise Increased Caution
  • Demonstration Alert: U.S. Embassy Accra, Ghana
  • Alert: Worldwide Caution Following Death of al-Qa’ida Leader
  • Health Alert: Monkeypox U. S. Embassy Accra, Ghana
  • Health Alert: Marburg Virus Disease U. S. Embassy Accra, Ghana
  • Demonstration Alert: U.S. Embassy Accra, Ghana
  • Message for U.S. Citizens: Postponement of Virtual Town Hall for U.S. Citizens to July 7 at 3:00 pm

excerpt.rendered: Event:  Thank you to everyone who registered interest in the virtual Town Hall with U.S. citizens scheduled for Thursday, June 30, 2022.  Ambassador Palmer has been unavoidably detained in Washington, DC.  We are therefore moving the Town Hall to Thursday, July 7, 2022 at 3:00 pm.  If you are interested in attending the virtual Town Hall and have not …
